Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-33394 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-30
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-33394 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 0.59.0-30. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 0.59.0-30, affected by CVE-2024-33394
